Arts and cultural activities.title: Arts and cultural activities
Arts and cultural activities.question: What types of performance schedules can I apply for in September every year?
Arts and cultural activities.answer: Every September you can apply for performance slots in drama, dance, music, folklore and other performance categories.

Arts and cultural activities.title: Arts and cultural activities
Arts and cultural activities.question: What units and organizations are included in the application qualifications?
Arts and cultural activities.answer: Application qualifications include individual performers, performing arts groups, cultural and art foundations, social groups, art studios, cultural institutions and art brokerage companies, etc.

Arts and cultural activities.title: Arts and cultural activities
Arts and cultural activities.question: What are the options for performance venues?
Arts and cultural activities.answer: The performance venue can choose the auditorium of the Academic Activity Center of Academia Sinica or other suitable performance venues.

Arts and cultural activities.title: Arts and cultural activities
Arts and cultural activities.question: When can I view the detailed registration information for the event?
Arts and cultural activities.answer: Detailed registration information will be published on the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica before the event.

Arts and cultural activities.title: Arts and cultural activities
Arts and cultural activities.question: How to sign up for arts and cultural activities?
Arts and cultural activities.answer: To register for art and cultural activities, you can check the detailed registration information on the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica before the event, and then follow the instructions to register online. It should be noted that registration by phone or other means is not accepted.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: In what year was the "Central Research Lecture-Cross-County and City Science Popularization Lecture" held?
Popular science activities.answer: The cross-county and city popular science lectures in the Zhongyan Lecture Hall have been held since 107.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: What is the main purpose of holding this event?
Popular science activities.answer: The main purpose of holding this event is to allow students from other counties and cities to hear the research lectures of Academia Sinica without being affected by the gap between traffic and urban and rural areas.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: So far, which counties and cities have held this event?
Popular science activities.answer: Sorry, the counties and cities where the event has been held are not clearly listed according to the information provided, but 9 counties and cities have been visited so far.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: What is the average number of applicants for each speech?
Popular science activities.answer: The average number of applicants for each speech is about 300 people.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: What was the highest view count for a speech video?
Popular science activities.answer: The highest number of views of the speech film has reached nearly 70,000 times.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: How will Academia Sinica organize this event in the future?
Popular science activities.answer: In the future, Academia Sinica will continue to plan and hold this event, and give priority to holding it in counties and cities that have not been visited yet. The first event this year will be held at Wuling High School in Taoyuan. The specific registration information will be announced on the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: Where will the first event of the year be held?
Popular science activities.answer: The first event this year will be held at Wuling High School in Taoyuan.

Popular science activities.title: Zhongyan Lecture Hall──Science popularization speeches across counties and cities
Popular science activities.question: Where will the detailed registration information be announced?
Popular science activities.answer: Detailed registration information will be announced on the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica.

Popular science activities.title: campus open
Popular science activities.question: When will this year's campus open event be held?
Popular science activities.answer: This year's Campus Open Event was held on October 21st.

Popular science activities.title: campus open
Popular science activities.question: What kinds of popular science activities will there be on the day of the event?
Popular science activities.answer: On the day of the event, there will be many types of popular science activities, such as speeches, workshops, exhibitions, video appreciation, interactive experiences, handicrafts and parent-child games, etc. And some activities can also be attended online!

Popular science activities.title: campus open
Popular science activities.question: Are there any special interactive activities planned for the children during the opening of the campus this time?
Popular science activities.answer: The opening of the campus this time has planned age-specific interactive activities for children, so that they can experience the fun of science through games.

Popular science activities.title: campus open
Popular science activities.question: How can I inquire about event details and registration-related information?
Popular science activities.answer: You can go to the official website of Academia Sinica to inquire about the activities and registration information. The website also has a page for previous years' activities, where you can see links to information about activities in the past three years. This year's event date is October 21, 2011, and detailed information will be announced on the official website of Academia Sinica.

Popular science activities.title: campus open
Popular science activities.question: Is there any website where I can check the opening activities of the campus over the years?
Popular science activities.answer: You can go to the official website of Academia Sinica to check the information on the opening activities of the campuses over the years. There are links to the activities of the past three years.

Popular science activities.title: Feast of knowledge
Popular science activities.question: Is the Knowledge Feast series of popular science lectures held every Tuesday night?
Popular science activities.answer: Yes, the knowledge feast series of popular science lectures are held on Tuesday nights of the activity month.

Popular science activities.title: Feast of knowledge
Popular science activities.question: Which research field experts will be invited to give lectures in this event?
Popular science activities.answer: This event will invite experts from different research fields inside and outside Academia Sinica to give lectures.

Popular science activities.title: Feast of knowledge
Popular science activities.question: Which YouTube account will the speech content be uploaded to for everyone to watch?
Popular science activities.answer: The content of the speech will be uploaded to the official YouTube account of Academia Sinica for everyone to watch.

Popular science activities.title: Feast of knowledge
Popular science activities.question: How to find the registration information for this event on the official website of Academia Sinica and Facebook?
Popular science activities.answer: To find the registration information for this event, you can check the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica before the event starts, and the registration information will be posted there. But be careful, the event is an online registration system, and you cannot register by phone or other means.

Popular science activities.title: Feast of knowledge
Popular science activities.question: The event does not accept telephone registration, so how to proceed with online registration?
Popular science activities.answer: To register online, you can follow the official website and official Facebook account of Academia Sinica before the event. The registration information will be announced in advance, and then follow the instructions to register online. However, they do not accept registration by phone or other means.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: What is the science popularization platform "Research Youwu"?
Science promotion.answer: Yanzhiyouwu is a popular science platform, established in April 2016. It mainly introduces the researchers and research results of Academia Sinica through easy-to-understand graphic reports. So far, there have been nearly 240 popular science articles, and two physical books have been published, as well as its own Facebook and IG pages. In the future, Yanzhiyouwu will continue to publish more popular science articles related to the research of Academia Sinica and expand its readership.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: How many popular science articles has "Research Youwu" published?
Science promotion.answer: "Research Youwu" has published nearly 240 popular science articles.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: What physical books have been published by "Research Youwu"?
Science promotion.answer: "Research Youwu" has published two physical books. The first is "Research Youwu: Traveling Through Ancient and Modern Times" published in 2010! Academia Sinica's 25 Humanities Open Classes" is a series of books from the Humanities Group. The second book is "Research and Youwu: A Book of Micro-knowledge" published in 110 years! Academia Sinica's 21 Life Science Lessons" is a series of books by the Life Group. Moreover, they expect to launch a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: When do they expect to launch the Mathematics Group series of books?
Science promotion.answer: They expect to launch a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: What are the future plans for "Research Youwu"?
Science promotion.answer: In the future, Yanzhiyouwu plans to continue to produce popular science articles related to the research of Academia Sinica, and also strengthen cooperation with public and private sectors and different types of media to expand the readership. They expect to publish a series of books on mathematics and physics in 113 years.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: How many fans does the Facebook page of Academia Sinica "Research Youwu" have?
Science promotion.answer: Academia Sinica's "Yan Zhi You Wu" Facebook page has about 61,000 fans.

Science promotion.title: research
Science promotion.question: What is the approximate number of followers on their IG page?
Science promotion.answer: Their IG page has about 12,900 followers.

Science promotion.title: social media
Science promotion.question: Wow, Academia Sinica has more than 160,000 Facebook followers?
Science promotion.answer: Yes, the number of Facebook fans of Academia Sinica has exceeded 160,000, and they also have many fans and subscribers on other social platforms!

Science promotion.title: social media
Science promotion.question: The IG account was opened in 2018, so how many followers have you accumulated now?

Science promotion.title: social media
Science promotion.question: On the YouTube platform, how many subscribers does Academia Sinica’s official video and audio channel currently have?
Science promotion.answer: On the YouTube platform, the official video and audio channel of Academia Sinica currently has more than 80,600 subscribers.

Science promotion.title: social media
Science promotion.question: 320 videos have been uploaded so far, is there any special recommendation?
Science promotion.answer: So far, 320 videos have been uploaded, including Academia Sinica's research results and popular science speeches, etc. You can choose to watch according to your interests!

communication.title: Activity telephone communication expense subsidy
communication.question: How do I know if I am eligible for the Cellular Communications Subsidy?
communication.answer: To know whether you are eligible to apply for a mobile phone communication fee subsidy, you can check the objects of the Academia Sinica who pay the mobile phone communication fee, including a series of positions such as dean and vice president. If your position is on this list, you may be eligible. The undertaker of special business can also sign the case and ask the president or his authorized personnel to approve it and handle it accordingly. For specific qualifications and detailed regulations, please refer to the relevant website of Academia Sinica.

communication.title: Activity telephone communication expense subsidy
communication.question: The amount of subsidy is divided into different amounts. What is the basis for determining it?
communication.answer: The different amount of subsidy is determined according to the position. Full subsidy for the dean, vice-president and the secretary-general of the institute; the executive secretary and deputy executive secretary of the Academic Consulting Association; the director and deputy director of the research institute; the director and deputy director of the preparatory office of the research institute; the director and deputy director of the research center; the deputy director The secretary-general, directors of divisions, offices, and central units, etc., will receive a monthly subsidy of NT$1,000; the exclusive driver of the dean, vice-president, and secretary-general will receive a monthly subsidy of NT$500. If the business is special, it can be subsidized after approval by the dean or his authorized personnel.

communication.title: Activity telephone communication expense subsidy
communication.question: What should I do if I apply for subsidies due to special business needs?
communication.answer: If you apply for a subsidy due to special business needs, you can submit the Academia Sinica Subsidy Mobile Phone Communication Fee Application Form. For the content of the form, please refer to this URL: https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/posts/78974. Then the project can be signed and approved by the dean or his authorized personnel for subsidy.

communication.title: Activity telephone communication expense subsidy
communication.question: Does the mobile phone number have to be registered in the name of Academia Sinica?
communication.answer: Yes, all phone numbers for which the Academia Sinica bears the mobile phone communication fee must be registered in the name of the Academia Sinica.

communication.title: Activity telephone communication expense subsidy
communication.question: Where can I inquire about more detailed subsidy regulations?
communication.answer: If you want to know more detailed subsidy regulations, you can refer to the website of Academia Sinica’s Supplementary Regulations on Handling Principles of Mobile Phone Communication Fees: https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/posts/78724.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: Is this kindergarten divided into small classes, middle classes, big classes and mixed age classes?
hall.answer: Yes, this kindergarten is divided into small class, middle class, big class and mixed age class, a total of four classes.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: There are 30 children in each class, right?
hall.answer: Yes, there are 30 children in each class.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: Is the recruitment of new students announced in late April every year?
hall.answer: Yes, in late April every year, the recruitment of new students from small classes and mixed-age classes will be announced.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: Is it suitable for children aged 3 to 6?
hall.answer: Yes, it is suitable for children aged 3 to 6. The kindergarten attached to Academia Sinica enrolls children aged 3-6, and the enrollment is announced in late April every year.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: How do I know the school age of my child?
hall.answer: You can calculate your child's school age based on the school age announced by the Taipei City Bureau of Education for each semester. However, if you want to know more about the private kindergartens attached to Academia Sinica in Taipei, you can check their website: https://kindergarten.sinica.edu.tw/.

hall.title: kindergarten
hall.question: Where can I find more information about kindergartens?
hall.answer: You can find more kindergarten information at this website: https://kindergarten.sinica.edu.tw/.

hall.title: Babysitting Center
hall.question: What is the age range accepted by the babysitting center?
hall.answer: The age range for babysitters is from 2 months to under 2 years old.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: Where is the academic activity center located?
hall.answer: The Academic Activity Center is located in Nangang District, Taipei City.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: How many guest rooms and meeting rooms are there in the Academic Activity Center?
hall.answer: The academic activity center has 120 guest rooms, a theater-shaped auditorium and 5 meeting rooms.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: How can I learn about the arts and cultural activities of the Academic Activity Center?
hall.answer: For information about the arts and cultural activities of the Academic Activity Center, you can refer to the website of Academia Sinica at https://www.sinica.edu.tw/ch.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: What restaurants are available in the Food Street of the Academic Activity Center?
hall.answer: There are many different restaurants in the Food Street of the Academic Activity Center. For a specific list, please refer to the information on the Academic Activity Center webpage. The website is https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/pages/1391. After entering, you can see the latest list of manufacturers.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: What discounts are there for Academia Sinica employees?
hall.answer: Employees of Academia Sinica can enjoy preferential prices in the academic activity center when they book rooms in the Academic Activity Center.

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: Where can I find employee discounted prices for the academic activity center restaurant?
hall.answer: To inquire about the preferential prices for employees in the restaurant of the Academic Activity Center, you can go to the website of the Academic Activity Center (https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/pages/1391).

hall.title: Academic Activity Center
hall.question: How can I get the latest information about the Academic Activity Center?
hall.answer: To obtain the latest information of the Academic Activity Center, just enter the website of the Academic Activity Center of Academia Sinica, and then click on the latest news. The URL is https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/pages/1389.

hall.title: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall
hall.question: In what year was the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall completed?
hall.answer: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall was completed in 1960.

hall.title: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall
hall.question: How can I find the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall in the Academia Sinica?
hall.answer: To find the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall, walk straight along the Mathematics and Science Avenue in the Academia Sinica, and then walk up the slope next to the Information Technology Innovation Research Center, and you will reach your destination.

hall.title: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall
hall.question: What were the main functions and uses of the Cai Yuanpei Memorial in the past?
hall.answer: In the past, the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall was mainly used to hold academician meetings and review meetings of the Academia Sinica.

hall.title: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall
hall.question: Who presided over the financing and construction of the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall?
hall.answer: Dean Hu Shi is the person who presided over the fundraising and construction of Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall.

hall.title: Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall
hall.question: What is the address of Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall?
hall.answer: The address of the Cai Yuanpei Memorial Hall is No. 128, Section 2, Yuanyuan Road, Nangang District, Taipei City, located in the courtyard of the Academia Sinica.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: What special works of the Lingnan School of Painting are exhibited at the Lingnan Art Museum?
hall.answer: The Lingnan Art Museum is now exhibiting the works of the Lingnan School of Painting in the past century, allowing the audience to understand the origin and development of the school.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: Is Lingnan Art Museum closed on Sundays and national holidays?
hall.answer: Yes, Lingnan Art Museum is closed on Sundays and national holidays.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: Is Lingnan Art Museum open from 12:00 to 5:00 pm from Tuesday to Friday?
hall.answer: Yes, the opening hours are from 12:00 noon to 5:00 pm from Tuesday to Friday.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: The Lingnan Art Museum opens at 10:00 am on Saturday and stays open until 5:00 pm, right?
hall.answer: Yes, Lingnan Art Museum is open from 10 am to 5 pm on Saturday.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: If I want to learn about the origin and development of the Lingnan School of Painting, is the Lingnan Art Museum a good place to go?
hall.answer: Yes, the Lingnan Art Museum is exhibiting works of the Lingnan School of Painting over the past century. You can learn about the origin and development of the Lingnan School of Painting by appreciating these works.

hall.title: Lingnan Art Museum
hall.question: Where can I find information on the official website of Lingnan Art Museum?
hall.answer: You can find information about Lingnan Art Museum at this website: https://lnfam.sinica.edu.tw.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: When is the gymnasium open?
hall.answer: The opening hours of the gymnasium are from 6:00 am to 10:00 pm every day, and the swimming pool is from 6:00 am to 9:30 pm. However, it should be noted that the museum is closed every Monday from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon, and it will also be closed during the Spring Festival.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: What kind of hospital discounts can employees enjoy?
hall.answer: Employees can enjoy preferential prices in the gymnasium. For specific prices, please refer to the fee list on the website.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: How can I use the e-mail registration account in the hospital to rent venues online by myself?
hall.answer: You can register an account at this website (https://gym.dga.sinica.edu.tw/login.html) with your e-mail address in the hospital. After registration, you can rent venues online by yourself.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: What are the regular rhythm courses offered by the Rhythm Group Recreation Association?
hall.answer: Regarding the regular rhythm courses offered by the Rhythm Group Recreation Club, the text here does not provide specific course names. You can go to the hospital for relevant information.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: How many meters is the length of the indoor jogging track?
hall.answer: The indoor jogging track is divided into three circles, the inner circle is 138 meters long, the middle circle is 144 meters long, and the outer circle is 150 meters long.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: What fees do ordinary people need to pay to use the comprehensive gymnasium?
hall.answer: General public can refer to the price list on the gymnasium website for the fees for using the gymnasium at https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/pages/1396.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: What documents do I need to bring to enter the gymnasium?
hall.answer: To enter the comprehensive gymnasium, you need to bring the identification card of the Academia Sinica.

hall.title: Sports Complex
hall.question: Where can I eat in the gymnasium? What types of drinks and food can we bring in?
hall.answer: In the comprehensive gymnasium, only the lobby on the first floor can eat light food. However, when entering other facilities, you cannot bring food and drinks, only mineral water and sports drinks. Be careful to drink Oh!

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: Can I borrow the dormitory for new recruits at any time within 5 years?
stay.answer: Yes, within five years of taking office, you can borrow the dormitory for new recruits at any time. However, it should be noted that the single-room and multi-room new student dormitories can only be borrowed once.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: Is it true that the single-room dormitory and the multi-room new student dormitory can be borrowed once?
stay.answer: Yes, newly recruited researchers can borrow the single-room dormitory and multi-room dormitory for newly recruited scholars once within five years. After borrowing a single-room dormitory, you can no longer borrow a new-hire single-room dormitory, but you can still borrow a new-hire multi-room dormitory within five years.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: If I want to borrow a dormitory, I should first ask the dormitory organizers of each center to apply for it on my behalf?
stay.answer: Yes, if you want to borrow a dormitory, you should first contact the dormitory sponsors of each center and ask them to apply on your behalf.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: What are the restrictions on borrowing the dormitory for newly recruited students?
stay.answer: Restrictions on borrowing dormitories for newly recruited scholars, including that researchers can borrow dormitories for newly recruited scholars (divided into single-room and multi-room dormitories) at any time within five years of their appointment, but each type of dormitory can only be borrowed once. For detailed borrowing regulations, please refer to the website "Academia Sinica Dormitory Management Points": https://dga.sinica.edu.tw/posts/78695. If you need to transfer other types of dormitories, you must also abide by the relevant regulations.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: Do I need to prepare the furniture and home appliances for the dormitory by myself?
stay.answer: Yes, the dormitory does not provide furniture and appliances, you have to prepare them yourself.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: Does the dormitory provide parking and free internet access?
stay.answer: There is a parking lot in the dormitory, and you can borrow it for a fee. As for the Internet, you can apply for free use at the Information Service Office.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: Do I need to restore the dorm to its original condition and remove large waste when I check out?
stay.answer: Yes, dorms will need to be restored to their original condition and large debris removed upon check-out.

stay.title: Dormitory information
stay.question: How to know the geographical location and transportation mode of the newly recruited student dormitory?
stay.answer: To know the geographical location and transportation mode of the dormitory for newly recruited students, you can inquire through the dormitory organizers of each center.

transportation.title: Campus Parking
transportation.question: Do I need to pay any tolls if I want to park in the campus on weekdays?
transportation.answer: If you enter the campus to park on weekdays, you need to pay a metered fee. The charging period is from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm, and the fee is 20 yuan per hour. However, it is free for less than 30 minutes in the first hour. Starting from the second hour, less than 30 minutes will be charged at 10 yuan per half hour, and more than 30 minutes will be charged at 20 yuan per hour.

transportation.title: Campus Parking
transportation.question: What is the application process for regular fees?
transportation.answer: To apply for a regular fee, you must first download the application form for a parking permit from the website of the General Affairs Office, fill it out, find a seal at the unit window, and then send it to the General Affairs Office for application. When you are notified that you can collect the parking pass and pay the fee, the application is considered complete.

transportation.title: Campus Parking
transportation.question: What are the restrictions and regulations for locomotives in the campus?
transportation.answer: Locomotives are strictly restricted within the compound. Except for the official patrol cars of the police station and the garrison squad, and disabled motorcycles, other motorcycles are not allowed to pass in the courtyard. The locomotives should be parked in the designated parking lot for locomotives unless there is special permission to enter the hospital in case of emergency.

transportation.title: traffic information
transportation.question: Where is the location of Academia Sinica?
transportation.answer: Academia Sinica is located at No. 128, Section 2, Yuanyuan Road, Nangang District, Taipei City.

transportation.title: traffic information
transportation.question: How to inquire about the various modes of transportation to Academia Sinica?
transportation.answer: You can refer to this website (https://www.sinica.edu.tw/ch/articles/37) to learn about the various transportation methods to Academia Sinica.

transportation.title: traffic information
transportation.question: Where can I download the campus guide map?
transportation.answer: You can download the campus guide map through this website: https://www.sinica.edu.tw/downloadFile_m.php?file=0003p1.pdf&_downloadName=asmap_c_20210813.pdf

transportation.title: traffic information
transportation.question: Does Academia Sinica have any special attractions or facilities?
transportation.answer: For the special attractions or facilities of Academia Sinica, please refer to this campus guide map: https://www.sinica.edu.tw/downloadFile_m.php?file=0003p1.pdf&_downloadName=asmap_c_20210813.pdf, which has a detailed introduction.
